legacy.description: Director-General, Department of African Affairs, MFA, China
legacy.name: 吴鹏 Wu Peng

legacy.full_text:
Glad to see the success of #Mali ’s national pavilion in its debut of Country Exhibition zone at the 6th #CIIE. Shea butter, sesame oil... 

Mali’s handicrafts & agricultural products meet the global market via CIIE and are sold like hot cakes. Small booth, Big opportunity. https://t.co/Rfba80YgoK

legacy.description: Director-General, Department of African Affairs, MFA, China
legacy.name: 吴鹏 Wu Peng

legacy.full_text:
On Nov 16, 300+ delegates from #China and #Africa attended the West Lake Forum on China-Africa Economy and Trade&2nd Forum Zhejiang Economic and Trade Cooperation with Africa. 

I look forward to more communication and cooperation on trade and investment between us. https://t.co/jUHbLXonus

legacy.description: Director-General, Department of African Affairs, MFA, China
legacy.name: 吴鹏 Wu Peng

legacy.full_text:
Congrats to all winners of the Short Videos Competition of “Join Hands and Share Stories for Better Life: China-Africa Friendship”! These short videos are exactly microcosms embodying #China-#Africa friendship. 

Look forward to more activities like this linking us closer. https://t.co/BrGD0GDSfK

legacy.description: Director-General, Department of African Affairs, MFA, China
legacy.name: 吴鹏 Wu Peng

legacy.full_text:
On Nov 14, about 60 representatives from #China🇨🇳 and #Kenya🇰🇪 attended a forum held in Nairobi and discussed viable pathways for both sides to pursue modernization. 

Hope to extend exchanges with Africa and advance our respective modernization with distinctive features. https://t.co/RxwQEoQatn

legacy.description: Director-General, Department of African Affairs, MFA, China
legacy.name: 吴鹏 Wu Peng

legacy.description: Bienvenue sur le compte officiel de la Présidence de la République Démocratique du Congo.
legacy.name: Présidence RDC 🇨🇩

legacy.full_text:
#RDC 13.11.2023|#Kinshasa
Le Président Félix Tshisekedi a inauguré, ce lundi, le poste électrique 220 KV de Kinsuka dont il avait lancé les travaux le 27 juillet 2021. Cette station de la #SNEL améliore la desserte en électricité dans la capitale et réduit les délestages. https://t.co/BKVdLqHctc

Congratulations!  

Funded by Chinese financial institutions and built in cooperation between #SNEL and Chinese company Shanghai Electric, Kinsuka electrical substation will provide reliable power supply to 2+ million residents around Kinshasa.🇨🇩

legacy.description: 中国驻贝尔法斯特总领事馆官方推特账号
legacy.name: 中国驻贝尔法斯特总领事馆

legacy.description: 中国驻纽约总领事 Chinese Consul General in New York
legacy.name: Huang Ping 黄屏

legacy.description: Chinese Ambassador to Egypt
legacy.name: Liao Liqiang

legacy.description: Director-General, Department of African Affairs, MFA, China
legacy.name: 吴鹏 Wu Peng

legacy.full_text:
On Nov 10, the Africa CDC unveiled 🇨🇳China-aided Dr. Wu Lien-Teh laboratory at its headquarters in #Ethiopia🇪🇹. 

Hope the new laboratory will open a new chapter in the public health cause in Africa and reinforce the long-term #China-#Africa friendship.https://t.co/3Rs406Xx1L https://t.co/iDj4NGzUSa

legacy.description: Director-General, Department of African Affairs, MFA, China
legacy.name: 吴鹏 Wu Peng

legacy.full_text:
On invitation of #CPAFCC, Mr. Adem Farah, the Vice President of Ethiopia Prosperity Party & governors of #Oromia,#Amhara,#Sidama,#Somali,#Afrar regions are visiting Sichuan & Shanghai in #China. 

The visit will surely further enhance #China-#Ethiopia friendship & cooperation🇨🇳🇪🇹 https://t.co/Lab0VehDFi

legacy.description: Director-General, Department of African Affairs, MFA, China
legacy.name: 吴鹏 Wu Peng

legacy.full_text:
This year marks the 60th anniversary of the dispatch of #China🇨🇳 Medical Teams. 

The representatives met journalists at #SCIO interview yesterday, sharing their stories and dedications in #Mali🇲🇱, #Guinea🇬🇳, #CentralAfrica🇨🇫, & #Ethiopia🇪🇹. https://t.co/V9pQUu4oQk

legacy.description: Director-General, Department of African Affairs, MFA, China
legacy.name: 吴鹏 Wu Peng

legacy.full_text:
The 1st edition of the #China Film Week was held from November 2 to 5 in 3 cities in #BurkinaFaso. 

It was co-organized by the Ouagadougou Pan-African Cinema Festival (Fespaco) & the Chinese Embassy, aiming to promote cultural dialogues between the two countries.🇨🇳🇧🇫 https://t.co/OUxSIpLSv1

legacy.description: Director-General, Department of African Affairs, MFA, China
legacy.name: 吴鹏 Wu Peng

legacy.full_text:
Another Brightness Action program just started in #Benin🇧🇯 to perform free cataract surgeries for 200 patients. 

Since 2014, #China🇨🇳 has launched such programs in #Asia, #Africa & Central America by sending outstanding Chinese ophthalmologists to perform such surgeries. https://t.co/kVmMk85C0L

legacy.description: Director-General, Department of African Affairs, MFA, China
legacy.name: 吴鹏 Wu Peng

legacy.full_text: It’s very interesting to see the presentation about perennial rice at The Second Forum on China-Africa Cooperation in Agriculture, which has been successfully tested in several African countries such as Senegal and Cote d’Ivoire. https://t.co/ZKUOWHPV5r

legacy.description: Director-General, Department of African Affairs, MFA, China
legacy.name: 吴鹏 Wu Peng

legacy.full_text: Glad to attend The Second Forum on China-Africa Cooperation in Agriculture, which was held in Sanya, Hainan on Nov 14. Hope that we can broaden the scope and depth of China-Africa Cooperation in Agriculture for supporting Africa to achieve sustainable agricultural development. https://t.co/b1k2pMShsn

legacy.description: Director-General, Department of African Affairs, MFA, China
legacy.name: 吴鹏 Wu Peng

legacy.full_text:
Recently, the #Zimbabwe-#Chinese Enterprises Job Fair was held, with 50+🇨🇳enterprises offering 1000+ jobs to🇿🇼youth. 

This job fair has been held for many years, which served as a valuable platform for Zimbabwean to explore employment opportunities. https://t.co/nWwyTrTuFt https://t.co/ABDuZzXwgW

legacy.description: Director-General, Department of African Affairs, MFA, China
legacy.name: 吴鹏 Wu Peng

legacy.full_text:
Kilimall, a 🇰🇪#Kenya-based Silk Road e-commerce platform, has built a digital bridge between #China & #Africa, achieving 100% e-payment and winning 10+ million registered users. 

It’s a good practice of the China-Africa cooperation on the digital economy. https://t.co/xocjqO5GsS https://t.co/zKVwvzh1e9

legacy.description: Director-General, Department of African Affairs, MFA, China
legacy.name: 吴鹏 Wu Peng

legacy.description: Embaixada da China em Angola
legacy.name: ChinaEmbAngola

legacy.full_text: Parabéns pela inauguração do Aeroporto Internacional Dr. António Agostinho Neto! É acreditado que este aeroporto internacional moderno construído pela empresa chinesa oferecerá mais oportunidades para o desenvolvimento da indústria da aviação de Angola. https://t.co/vYUZtaxM2B

Parabéns pela inauguração do Aeroporto Internacional Dr. António Agostinho Neto! 

This is not only a gift to Angola’s Independence Day, but also to the 40th anniversary of the establishment of #China-#Angola diplomatic relations.🇨🇳🇦🇴

legacy.description: Director-General, Department of African Affairs, MFA, China
legacy.name: 吴鹏 Wu Peng

legacy.full_text: Over the past 45 years, Ningxia,  province of China has sent 616 doctors to #Benin, who have successfully carried out 100,000+ operations and treated millions of Benin people. The medical personnel use their medical proficiency and ethics to benefit local people! https://t.co/inaQ8vjWxX

legacy.description: Director-General, Department of African Affairs, MFA, China
legacy.name: 吴鹏 Wu Peng

legacy.full_text: Since2018, the 1st China InternationalImport Expo(#CIIE), over 90 tons of #Zambian honey has been exported to China. With more and more high-quality products of Africa entering China, local people’s lives are getting as sweet as honey. https://t.co/FdqKYf2e1o

legacy.description: Director-General, Department of African Affairs, MFA, China
legacy.name: 吴鹏 Wu Peng

legacy.full_text: Happy to know that over 400 Nigerian government officials have received China’s agricultural technical training since 2016. Looking forward to more agriculture exchanges and cooperation between the two countries. https://t.co/kdEW7hQAxV https://t.co/DlSBImb4cH

legacy.description: Director-General, Department of African Affairs, MFA, China
legacy.name: 吴鹏 Wu Peng

legacy.full_text: The Chinese version of Vision for the Development of the #African Continent - Agenda 2063 and its First Decade of Planning and Implementation Report officially published. https://t.co/eLvvUH2eQe

legacy.description: Director-General, Department of African Affairs, MFA, China
legacy.name: 吴鹏 Wu Peng

legacy.full_text: China always respect the will of the African people and the Agenda 2063 of AU. Hope that Chinese enterprises will take this as an important consideration when designing commercial projects to deliver more tangible benefits to both people.
